titleInfo.title: Aerial View of National Asthma Center

physicalDescription.note: On the back of the matting: ''Aerial Picture of National Asthma Center in 1960's, 19th and Julian; #797.''

mods.abstract: Aerial view of the National Asthma Center at West 19th Avenue and Julian Street, part of Sloan's lake and the surrounding neighborhoods in Denver, Colorado in the 1960s. The National Asthma Center started as the Jewish Sheltering Home and later merged with the National Jewish Hospital.

name.namePart: National Jewish Hospital and Research Center/National Asthma Center (U.S.)

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Health Care and Philanthropy
